price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Monyε sotie ma Nyankopͻn ne Ɔsomafoͻ no; nasε wͻ’dane wͻn akyi ma (Nokorε no a), εneε nokorε sε Onyankopͻn deε Ɔmpε boniayεfoͻ no asεm”.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
